recipe.title: Beeritas
ingredients: 1 can (12 ounces) frozen limeade concentrate, slightly thawed, divided
instructions: Place 1 tablespoon limeade concentrate in a shallow bowl. Place salt in a second shallow bowl. In a third bowl, combine remaining limeade concentrate, beer and tequila. Rim 6 glasses with reserved limeade and salt. Divide beer mixture evenly among glasses; garnish each with a lime slice.
